channel.title: yellow on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in yellow on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: LfE 21: Season of Life… Under my Skin
item.description: 03/03/2010 Hello everyone, I’m halfway through my stay here in Edinburgh and every day brings me closer to the day I can come back home to Bangalore and hug my family.

item.title: For Now
item.description: October 2008 This yellow evening, Winds tell of rains to come. A healthy, happy wind That I haven’t felt for so long. Dry mango leaves

item.title: Autumn Garden
item.description: However dim the light, The leaves glow bright In the Autumn Garden Almost as if they had a light of their own The grass stays green In the Autumn Garden So green like paddy Pleasing and calm, sparkling Golden yellow, orange
